thread.title: Hotel Villa Saxe Eiffel
thread.title_full: Hotel Villa Saxe Eiffel - Review of Hotel Villa Saxe Eiffel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Linda S
title: Hotel Villa Saxe Eiffel
text: The hotel staff could not have been more helpful. They provided local directions, help with arranging tours, etc. The hotel is in a quiet charming neighborhood and the rooms are really clean and neat. The hotel breakfast was also very good. I highly recommend this hotel to people who would like to stay in the Eiffel Tower area.
